text: 11.3 Stt 3.1-5, 3.13, Jon 8.44, Hib 13.9, 2 Pi 3.17 Yad pen pɨlɨkebin. Bɨlel yoy yepɨs gep ak, ne Yip nop yepɨs agek nɨg dak tek, nɨbop abe gɨnɨmuŋ tek lɨnɨgab. Bɨ ogɨnap nɨbop abe takaw yepɨs okok ag dad amel, gos tɨmel kɨli nepal tek nɨŋɨd, Klays nop nokom gos nɨŋɨd gach ma mɨdɨl suŋtep nep mɨdebɨm ak kelɨgɨnɨmɨb tek lɨnɨgab. Anɨb ak tek yad pɨlɨkebin.
